body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have a Malignus in play
2. Have a life total higher than your opponent. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The Malignus' power and toughness should be equal to half your opponent's life; instead it's equal to half your life. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.27, Mac OS 10.6.8 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
